subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following tribes was a prominent tribe in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में कौन सी जनजाति प्रमुख थी?
explanation_en: Meena tribe was a prominent tribe in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मीणा जनजाति प्राचीन राजस्थान में प्रमुख थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: What was the dominant religion in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में प्रमुख धर्म क्या था?
explanation_en: Hinduism was the dominant religion in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: हिंदू धर्म प्राचीन राजस्थान में प्रमुख धर्म था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant feature of Ancient Rajasthani society?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी समाज में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण विशेषता थी?
explanation_en: Social hierarchy was a significant feature of Ancient Rajasthani society.
explanation_hi: सामाजिक व्यवस्था प्राचीन राजस्थानी समाज की महत्वपूर्ण विशेषता थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant form of art and architecture in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में कौन सा कला और वास्तुकला का महत्वपूर्ण रूप था?
explanation_en: Red sandstone architecture was a significant form of art and architecture in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: लाल बलुआ पत्थर की वास्तुकला प्राचीन राजस्थान में कला और वास्तुकला का महत्वपूर्ण रूप था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant occupation in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण व्यवसाय था?
explanation_en: Craftsman was a significant occupation in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कारीगर प्राचीन राजस्थान में महत्वपूर्ण व्यवसाय था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant festival in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण त्योहार था?
explanation_en: Navratri was a significant festival in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: नवरात्रि प्राचीन राजस्थान में महत्वपूर्ण त्योहार था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant institution in Ancient Rajasthani society?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी समाज में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण संस्था थी?
explanation_en: Gurukul was a significant institution in Ancient Rajasthani society.
explanation_hi: गुरुकुल प्राचीन राजस्थानी समाज में महत्वपूर्ण संस्था थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant mode of transportation in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण परिवहन का साधन था?
explanation_en: Camel was a significant mode of transportation in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: घोड़े प्राचीन राजस्थान में महत्वपूर्ण परिवहन का साधन था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant form of entertainment in Ancient Rajasthan?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थान में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण मनोरंजन का रूप था?
explanation_en: Music was a significant form of entertainment in Ancient Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: संगीत प्राचीन राजस्थान में महत्वपूर्ण मनोरंजन का रूप था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Prachin Rajasthan ka Samaj, Dharm aur Sanskriti
question_en: Which of the following was a significant aspect of Ancient Rajasthani culture?
question_hi: प्राचीन राजस्थानी संस्कृति में कौन सा महत्वपूर्ण पहलू था?
explanation_en: Respect for women was a significant aspect of Ancient Rajasthani culture.
explanation_hi: महिलाओं का आदर प्राचीन राजस्थानी संस्कृति में महत्वपूर्ण पहलू था।
